channel.title: CLI on AstromechZA - Ben Meier
channel.description: Recent content in CLI on AstromechZA - Ben Meier

item.title: Building better command-line tools and applications
item.description: A collection of tips and tricks for writing CLI-driven tools and applications. None of these are official guidelines of any kind but rather just the things I like to keep in mind when writing executable binaries, scripts, and even larger applications.
